xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager

Class MapTIdManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager.MapTIdManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, TIdManager, Convertable

    public class MapTIdManager
extends Object
implements TIdManager
    This class implements a TIdManager which uses a main memory HashMap to store the relationship between external identifyers (of type Long) and tuple identifyers inside the record manager. The identifyers are Long values which are produced by a LongIdGenerator.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected FixedSizeConverter idConverter
      Converter for the objects inside the TIds.
      protected LongIdGenerator idGenerator
      An id generator which produces identifiers that are Long values.
      protected Map map
      A main memory map to store the relationship between external identifiers (of type Long) and tuple identifiers inside the record manager.
      protected Converter mapConverter
      Converter for the map object.

    • Method Detail

      • getIdConverterInsideTIds

        public FixedSizeConverter getIdConverterInsideTIds()
        Returns a converter for the identifyer which occur inside TIds.
        Returns:
        A converter for the identifyer which occur inside TIds.

      • query

        public TId query(Object id)
        Translates an identifyer into a tuple identifyer. If the id does not exist then the return value is unspecified.
        Specified by:
        query in interface TIdManager
        Parameters:
        id - identifyer
        Returns:
        the tuple identifyer for the given identifyer.

      • ids

        public Iterator ids()
        Returns all currently stored ids in arbitrary order. If null is returned, then there is an identity mapping between Ids and TIds.
        Specified by:
        ids in interface TIdManager
        Returns:
        Iterator with the ids or null.

      • insert

        public Object insert(TId tid)
        Inserts a new TId and returns an identifyer. The RecordManager registers a tuple identifyer and gets back an identifyer for the object (which can also be the same tid). The TIdManager must be able to translate the returned Object back into the same TId.
        Specified by:
        insert in interface TIdManager
        Parameters:
        tid - tuple identifyer
        Returns:
        the identifyer under which the Record is reachable from outside the RecordManager.

      • update

        public void update(Object id,
                   TId newTId)
        Signals that an identifyer gets a new tuple identifyer. Here, the new TId is inserted into the map.
        Specified by:
        update in interface TIdManager
        Parameters:
        id - The identifyer used inside the application.
        newTId - The new tuple identifyer inside the RecordManager.

      • remove

        public void remove(Object id)
        Signals that the identifier is no longer needed. The identifyer is taken out of the map.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface TIdManager
        Parameters:
        id - the identifyer which has been given out is no longer needed by the RecordManager.

      • removeAll

        public void removeAll()
        Signals that all identifiers are no longer needed.
        Specified by:
        removeAll in interface TIdManager

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes this TIDManager. The map must still be accessible for the write method. So, nothing can be done here.
        Specified by:
        close in interface TIdManager

      • useLinks

        public boolean useLinks()
        Determines if the TIdManager uses TId-Links. This is only possible iff the Ids to be translated are TIds.
        Specified by:
        useLinks in interface TIdManager
        Returns:
        true iff links are uses inside the RecordManager.

      • objectIdConverter

        public FixedSizeConverter objectIdConverter()
        Returns a converter for the ids which are translated by the manager into TIds.
        Specified by:
        objectIdConverter in interface TIdManager
        Returns:
        a converter for serializing the identifiers.

      • getIdSize

        public int getIdSize()
        Returns the size of the ids in bytes.
        Specified by:
        getIdSize in interface TIdManager
        Returns:
        the size in bytes of each id.
